title:
Noticed your article on 3G service by AT&T IN WILMINGTON, finally, can you answer as to when AT&T IS GOING TO INSTALL U-VERSE TO LANDLINE BROADBAND  CUSTOMERS?????????

Why is Wilmington always last to get updated services from AT&T ?????
text:
No, we still can't answer that question because AT&T won't answer
it. They feel that announcing that question lets them lose a
competitive edge. We suggest you contacting AT&T with your complaints.
Thanks,
